TextBody:
Hi Chris,

Thank you for contacting Netwrix Technical Support.

Please note that PingCastle is compatible with the later versions of dotnet.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Regards,

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000HttGb:ref

Thanks Chris.

So for context Ali, we need to remove .NET 6 as it goes EOL on 12th November, and thus is a security fail for us afterwards.

I did install the .NET 8 hosting version, removing the .NET 6 equivalents afterwards, but the application (via web) was just saying an incorrect version of .NET was installed. So, do we need to reinstall PingCastle or something?

Thanks

Mark Cameron
Senior IT Operations Engineer, Identity and Platform
M: +7387128822
mark.cameron@dlapiper.com
DLA Piper UK LLP

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000HttGb:ref

Not sure where you got the information from Ali but we had to log another call to verify as we cannot make it work and can see lots of dot net 6 hardcoded references is pingcastle files.

[ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0HzjPw:ref ]

Hello Mark,

Thanks for contacting Netwrix Technical Support.

Unfortunately, a higher version of .NET is not supported at this moment. PingCastle supports ASP.NET 6 hosting bundle and you will need to downgrade to it in the meantime.
We are aware of the need to upgrade that, and the team is working on it, but I can't give you an ETA right now.

Will get you informed about this as soon as we have an update.

Please let me know if you have any question.

Thank you!
Regards,

Emiliano Kraiñuk
Technical Support Engineer
1-949-407-5125
____________________ __________
Cybersecurity That Works for You

Netwrix | 6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com 


We only recently bought the pro version of PingCastle and now will have to remove it from our environment till a dot net upgrade can be made as it causes us to fail security compliance audits from our clients.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #426028 - dot net 6 end of life
